  • Unified Window: Bubbles and Grid modes now share a single window - no more connection drops when switching.
  • Inline Screen Share: View shared screens directly in the call window with minimize/maximize controls.
  • Grid Mode Chat: Full chat and reactions support in fullscreen Grid mode.

Try it: Click "New" button on any room card to use the new system.
